segments.text: We can't go that way , the road is blocked for the next few days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's right . They're filming a movie up there , aren't they ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Some high speed chase scene , I think .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wonder how all the businesses in the area feel about that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that they get a pretty good payoff .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The movie company has to pay them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know about all of that , but think about it , their business gets free publicity !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yeah , they get to be in a movie for the whole world to see !
segments.speaker: S2
